channel.title: EndoScape Version 0.3 (Includes client)
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i412.photobucket.com/albums/pp210/Kihomura/EndoScapetitle.png[/img][/center]
[center]The base is Devolution 7.8.[/center]
[center]A little note: This server is not even close to complete, so far there is 2 shops, because this is pretty much just giving you a taste of what the full server will look like, so I don't want any comments such as "Omg, thers no shups, halp." I know, you want shops? Add them in, tough luck. Remember, this is version 0.3, I plan on releasing 1.0 soon, but not too soon.[/center]
-Max combat level is 138. -Rock crabs. -Adjusted Magic damage/exp. -Go to wizard tower to get runes. -Economy based. -Decently slow training, not too hard, not too easy. -Fixed Dragonfire shield(moves when you walk, do emotes, etc.) [Client-side] -Moderators/Administrators cannot drop items. [Owners can] -Moderators/Administrators cannot trade. [Owners can] -You loose items when killed -Beast cave (Filled with creatures such as Dark beasts, Abyssal demons, etc.) [In V1.0, you train slayer here.] -Crappy version of the Barrow's minigame, will fix by version 1.0. -Perfect alching. -My own version of clue scrolls. -Based in Relleka. -Added Defenders [Bronze - Rune] -Some of the 'newer' items have perfect bonus' (Same as RuneScape's) -Dagannoth lair. (Drops Dragon hatchet, Berserker ring,etc.) (Will add Dagannoth kings in V1.0) ~There's a bit more, but it escapes my mind at the moment.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SnUDG4bQJQE http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AlaqWQl_Oi4
[IMG]http://i412.photobucket.com/albums/pp210/Kihomura/EndoScapepic2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i412.photobucket.com/albums/pp210/Kihomura/EndoScapepic3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i412.photobucket.com/albums/pp210/Kihomura/EndoScapepic6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i412.photobucket.com/albums/pp210/Kihomura/EndoScapepic7.png[/img]
Special attacks
[IMG]http://i412.photobucket.com/albums/pp210/Kihomura/DDSSpecial.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i412.photobucket.com/albums/pp210/Kihomura/Dragonlongspecial.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i412.photobucket.com/albums/pp210/Kihomura/Dragonmacespecial.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i412.photobucket.com/albums/pp210/Kihomura/DragonScimitarspecial.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i412.photobucket.com/albums/pp210/Kihomura/GraniteMaulSpecial.gif[/img]
Magic shortbow
[IMG]http://i412.photobucket.com/albums/pp210/Kihomura/MagicShortbow.gif[/img]
Alching
[IMG]http://i412.photobucket.com/albums/pp210/Kihomura/AlchingemoteandGFX.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i412.photobucket.com/albums/pp210/Kihomura/Alchinginventory.gif[/img]
Clue scrolls
[IMG]http://i412.photobucket.com/albums/pp210/Kihomura/Cluescroll.gif[/img]
Client information
-Fixed method349 so sprites load easier. -Added fixed Dragonfire shield. (Thanks to Universal-X.) -417 gamframe. (My personal favorite :D) -No custom items.
[font=SimHei][size=30pt][url=http://files.filefront.com/EndoScapezip/;12041496;/fileinfo.html]DOWNLOAD[/url][/size][/font] -Server/Filefront
[font=SimHei][size=30pt][url=http://files.filefront.com/EndoScape+official+clientzip/;12041431;/fileinfo.html]DOWNLOAD[/url][/size][/font] -Client/Filefront
[b]Server credits[/b]
[b]DeltaScape (Delta_)[/b] - Borrowed some ideas from deltascape. [b]RichScape v2 (`Rich)[/b] - Borrowed TzHaar Autospawn.cfg. [b]Primadude[/b] - Perfect alching
[b]Client credits[/b]
[b]Galkon[/b] - Client base. [b]Scarecrows[/b] - Link for Galkon's client base. [b]Universal-X[/b] - Dragonfire shield fixed models.
Thank you everyone, and enjoy.

item.title: EndoScape Version 0.3 (Includes client)
item.dc:creator: @megamouse megamouse
item.description:
@megamouse wrote:

[quote=“kihomura, post:31, topic:236312”][quote author=megamouse link=topic=311829.msg2493626#msg2493626 date=1224281193]
i think it needs alot doing too it…example of the teleports needs the blue thing needs shops, more attack-able npcs, more commands like ::master for admins/mods/owner …relised to soon could be great “could”
[/quote]

Administrators are there to help the server, not to have fun and screw around, same for moderators. I’m working on disabling attacking for moderators and administrators, and having only owners be able to do everything.

I’m working on changing the graphics and emotes in the triggerTele method, and working on more NPCs such as green dragons in the wilderness. There isn’t many shops right now because this is still version 0.3; and shops aren’t really a big concern for me at the moment. There will be more commands for Administrators, but I still need to make it so Administrators can’t duel other players, or better yet, stake items.

There is still alot of work to do.

I still need to fix Woodcutting, add Firemaking, Cooking, Thieving, Slayer, Working prayer, add better Fletching and more.

*Edit: Also, adding ::master is one of the worst things to add to an economy-based server.[/quote] yea but i always add ::master so only owner can do it …i can never be botherd to train up myself lol…gl with 0.3 though

Read full topic

item.title: EndoScape Version 0.3 (Includes client)
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote=“I PK Pigeons, post:33, topic:236312”][quote author=megamouse link=topic=311829.msg2493626#msg2493626 date=1224281193]
i think it needs alot doing too it…example of the teleports needs the blue thing needs shops, more attack-able npcs, more commands like ::master for admins/mods/owner …relised to soon could be great “could”
[/quote]

Those are extremely easy to add, and really wouldn’t make the server Better simple npc’s make it look better but thats it, and shops cramped together are horrible as well. Staff should have to work too on my server only i could spawn and like Kiho said they are there to manage the server not piss around.

On topic it looks good for 0.3 but why did you release this early?[/quote]

I will be getting a better computer soon, because this computer is shitting itself, struggling to run the server, so I realized I’m going to get a better computer, or just go out an by more ram, because 400mb isn’t good enough for me.

Anyways; I posted it just in case I get a new computer, I don’t really feel like restarting. I’m probably going to put the server on a disk too.

tonypker13:

Woah. I can almost taste the ownage coming off of my toung

That sounded dirty, Lol.

Read full topic
